mapper.select: select t1.project_no ,t1.revision ,t1.team_count ,( select sds.sd_desc as teamDesc from stx_dis_sd_code sds where 1=1 and sd_type = 'PAINT_TEAM' and sds.enable_flag ='Y' and sds.attribute1 = t1.team_count and sds.attribute2 = 'COSMETIC' and rownum = 1) as team_desc ,t1.paint_item as paint_item ,t2.item_desc as item_desc ,sum(t1.quantity) as quantity ,sum(t1.quantity) as theory_quantity from stx_dis_pis_cosmetic t1 ,stx_dis_item t2 where t1.paint_item = t2.item_code and t1.project_no = #{project_no} and t1.revision = #{revision} group by t1.project_no,t1.revision,t1.team_count,t1.paint_item,t2.item_desc order by t1.project_no, t1.revision, t1.team_count, t1.paint_item
